authors.name: Jane Auston
authors.shortbiography: Jane Austen was an English novelist known primarily for her six novels, which implicitly interpret, critique, and comment upon the British landed gentry at the end of the 18th century

authors.shortbiography: Francis Scott Key Fitzgerald was an American novelist, essayist, and short story writer
